body_html: Just as a data point, I believe that if we returned sparse tensors for the gradients of indexing ops, we could avoid the nan by simply operating on the non-sparse elements. If it's a good idea to do this, I'm less sure.
body_text: Just as a data point, I believe that if we returned sparse tensors for the gradients of indexing ops, we could avoid the nan by simply operating on the non-sparse elements. If it's a good idea to do this, I'm less sure.
body: Just as a data point, I believe that if we returned sparse tensors for the gradients of indexing ops, we could avoid the nan by simply operating on the non-sparse elements. If it's a good idea to do this, I'm less sure.
